com.netflix.genie.client

Class BaseGenieClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.client.BaseGenieClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClusterConfigServiceClient, ExecutionServiceClient, HiveConfigServiceClient, PigConfigServiceClient

    public abstract class BaseGenieClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract REST client class that is extended to implement specific clients.

      • executeRequest

        protected <T extends BaseResponse> T executeRequest(com.netflix.client.http.HttpRequest.Verb verb,
                                        java.lang.String baseRestUri,
                                        java.lang.String uuid,
                                        com.google.common.collect.Multimap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                                        java.lang.Object request,
                                        java.lang.Class<T> responseClass)
                                         throws CloudServiceException
        Executes HTTP request based on user params, and performs marshaling/unmarshaling.
        Parameters:
        verb - GET, POST or DELETE
        baseRestUri - the base Uri to use in the request, e.g. genie/v0/jobs
        uuid - the id to append to the baseRestUri, if any (e.g. job ID)
        params - HTTP params (e.g. userName="foo")
        request - Genie request if applicable (for POST), null otherwise
        responseClass - class name of expected response to be used for unmarshalling
        Returns:
        extracted and unmarshalled response from the Genie Execution Service
        Throws:
        CloudServiceException
